title: Cleint seems to be ahving issues
body: Having issues starting games (accept button grey out.) getting errors for. Seems to be affecting multiple users (watching a guys on stream having a similar issue)

replies.body: I wasn't able to see any issues about this on our side.  Is everything okay now?
Same here. Join button greyed out. Then when I finally did get in a normal draft game it froze before the ban phase.  Boo.
Same thing here, got a 5 minute dodge timer because the ban champion button was grayed out
I had some very strange behavior in the client and now it looks like ranked flex is down?
looks like it's back as an option now
Same here, I press start queue, and then takes a bit to start looking for a match, and when I press Accept, it loads for a while and then fails.
Same thing here. It threatened to hit me with some kind of punishment if I kept "declining" queues even though I would click accept, and later get an error. Buttons greyed out as well.
Same fam client is taking a poop :l. Took ages to accept the invite.
Ranked Flex went down, I'm getting client-side lag, but no computer issues. Invasion Game Mode is locked.
Happening to my entire group. Super lagg on the client side.
